articles.title: Officials and Members of GFTUK Present Electric Locomotive
articles.content:
Officials and Members of GFTUK Present Electric Locomotive
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) presented an electric locomotive to mark the Seventh Congress of the GFTUK.
					 They briskly conducted the do-good-thing movement including the campaign of collecting materials lying idle and the working people at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex successfully made the electric locomotive in a short period. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made it sure that letters "electric locomotive marking the Seventh Congress of the GFTUK" were inscribed on it.
					
					 A ceremony for presenting the electric locomotive took place at the complex Sunday.

articles.title: Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in the palace.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Participants in Congress of GFTUK Watch Documentary Film
articles.content:
Participants in Congress of GFTUK Watch Documentary Film
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) on Saturday watched documentary film "By Ushering in Golden Age of Revolution" at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.
					 The film tells the stories that supreme leader Kim Jong Un brought about epochal changes in all fields of building a socialist power including the politics, military affairs, economy and culture by leading the whole party and army and all the people.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party Central Committee and officials concerned.

articles.title: Schoolchildren in Flood-afflicted Areas of Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province Start Camping
articles.content:
Schoolchildren in Flood-afflicted Areas of Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province Start Camping
Wonsan, October 23 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren in the flood-afflicted areas of the northern part of North Hamgyong Province started camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 The ceremony for starting camping was held on Oct. 21.
					
					 All the campers and teachers laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Songdowon International Children's Camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned, teachers of the camp and campers.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, there took place an art performance given by the teachers of the camp for the campers.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made for Development of Coal Industry
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made for Development of Coal Industry
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Phyongsong University of Coal Mining in the DPRK has made a lot of scientific achievements conducive to the country's development of coal industry.
					 The university manufactured a mine resistivity CT survey meter and small-sized electric drill and introduced them to various coal production units.
					
					 It also succeeded in making a motor speed regulator and an electricity-saving volt-ampere safety welder and established an air coal dressing process by differential air separator at the Kujang Area Coal Mining Complex.
					
					 Besides, the university made a great progress in researches into the introduction of a flexible operational and sequential control system for belt conveyor, the impregnation of timber and other objects.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Accused of Disturbing Registration of Sexual Slavery Records as World Heritage
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Accused of Disturbing Registration of Sexual Slavery Records as World Heritage
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Japan is getting so impudent as to cover up its past crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 When civilian organizations of different countries and regions applied the registration of crimes related to sexual slavery for the Japanese Imperial Army this year, Japan set it as its immediate foreign policy to check the registration in UNESCO. The Liberal Democratic Party of Japan threatened to put pressure such as holding of the contribution to UNESCO.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves to Undermine Ideology and Social System in DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves to Undermine Ideology and Social System in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article hits out at the south Korean puppet group of traitors for going ever more frantic in their racket for stifling the DPRK in league with foreign forces.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' sanctions and pressure on the DPRK amount to gangster-like hostile act aimed at undermining the ideology and social system in the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 All kinds of acts related to sanctions and steps the U.S. is now enforcing against the DPRK at present number more than hundreds and its sanctions and blockade against the latter involve external economic relations and all fibers of social life.
					
					 The final failure of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' sanctions and pressure on the DPRK is inevitable. 
					
					 Lots of wealth created by the DPRK in the course of building a socialist power are a clear testimony that neither military pressure nor economic sanctions nor blockade are workable on the DPRK.
					
					 We are fully ready to counter economic sanctions or military pressure by the enemies.
					
					 The U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors are seriously mistaken if they calculate they can bring down the DPRK through the tightened sanctions and pressure. It is as foolish an act as running one's head against a wall.
					
					 The ideology and social system in the DPRK remain unshakable in any storm and stress.

articles.title: Papers Term Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invective Miserable Scream
articles.content:
Papers Term Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invective Miserable Scream
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, old witch of Chongwadae, is getting ever more desperate in the confrontation with the compatriots in the north with her doom drawing nearer, say newspapers in commentaries on Sunday.
					 Traitor Park in her recent "video message" sent to such burlesque as "sports contests of inhabitants in provinces of the north" malignantly slandered the DPRK's nuclear deterrence, terming it "serious threat to the nation's future and peace" and the like. Earlier, at a meeting with betes noires of the Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification she kicked off confrontation hysteria, crying out for the "north's dismantlement of its nukes" and grumbling about "provocation".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that what she raved is nothing but a miserable scream and piteous moan of pain made by the losers, frightened by the inexhaustible strength of the nuclear power in the east and the military power of Juche.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Park is apt to stage such a ridiculous charade, painting the north's nuclear deterrent for self-defence as "threat" and "provocation." 
					
					 Lurking behind this row is a sinister aim to weather her unprecedentedly serious ruling crisis. 
					
					 As her fate is hanging by a thread, she is making desperate efforts to divert public attention elsewhere and get rid of the mire of destruction by noisily trumpeting about "security crisis" under the pretext of "threat" from the north.
					
					 But, this is no more than a foolish act. What remains to be done by her is just to be obedient to her fate of going to her grave. 
					
					 Minju Joson warns Park that she should know clearly that with nothing can she escape her miserable fate already sealed and she is bound to face a stern judgment by all Koreans.

articles.title: Army Officers' Sexual Violence Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Army Officers' Sexual Violence Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed that two south Korean puppet army officers committed sexual assault in Kwangju, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on Oct. 19.
					 The then cadets of a military training group in November last year got a woman drunken in a bar and took her to other place before committing a group rape.
					
					 One of them again committed a sexual abuse against a woman in her 20s in July this year.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Behaviors Enrage DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Behaviors Enrage DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, chief executive of south Korea, has got evermore pronounced in the confrontation moves against the DPRK.
					 Park would frequently talk rubbish about "reign of terror", "violation of human rights" and the like to insult the DPRK. She went the lengths of agitating "defection from the north" at a "commemorative ceremony" some days ago and thus infuriated all citizens in the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Song Uk, manager of the Pyongyang Steel Works, told KCNA:
					
					 Her remarks go to prove that she is a mentally deranged person.
					
					 The DPRK is the world's best socialist society centered on the popular masses, where the people's dignity and rights are ensured on the highest level and all their dreams and ideals are translated into reality.
					
					 However, Park Geun Hye dares slander the advantageous socialist system of the DPRK in a bid to save her regime from the crisis of destruction.
					
					 The only way out for Park, a psychopath seized with confrontation, is to go to a graveyard.
					
					 All the employees of the works are now putting spurs to the production of steel, with their fixed will to throw Park, a witch, into a smelting furnace.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Change Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Change Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the Society for Inheriting June Democratic Resistance, the People's Action for Democracy and other civic and social organizations of south Korea held a meeting for the formation of the committee for promoting the commemoration of the 30th anniversary of the June democratic resistance in Seoul on Oct. 19.
					 The speakers said that the authorities' suppression is becoming craftier, calling for paving the way for the second June resistance and bring about a regime change without fail and thus eliminating all remnants of "yusin."
					
					 The participants made public a declaration.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays in October Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays in October Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place in Myanmar, Finland, Austria, Hungary, Slovenia, Venezuela, Uganda, South Africa, Tanzania, Guinea and Niger from September 30 to October 11 on the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), its 71st founding anniversary and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 A vice-chairman of the Yangon Regional Executive Committee of the Myanmar's National League for Democracy said he could know better that the WPK is the party which has strong sense of organization and discipline and serves the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish Communists' League said the WPK founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il has demonstrated its dignity as the revolutionary party of Juche as it has upheld Marshal Kim Jong Un at its top post.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Makerere University of Uganda said the WPK has developed into the invincible party under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of a region of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party said the WPK has invariably advanced despite the strong tempest of history for over 70 years since its foundation as it has been led by its only guiding idea Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and achieved iron-like unity and cohesion of the whole party and enjoyed absolute support and trust from the popular masses.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said the WPK is the veteran and tested party which has led the Korean people to victory and prosperity for a long period.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the lecture held in Finland.

articles.title: Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported by Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported by Bangladeshi Personage
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League and chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, released a statement on Oct. 12 to observe the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Noting the DIU formed by President Kim Il Sung is a vanguard organization of revolutionaries of the new generation, the statement said:
					
					 The programme of the DIU reflects the cherished desire of the popular masses to live and develop independently free from exploits and oppression.
					
					 The principle of independence put forward by the DIU has become guidelines in the building and activities of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The WPK is stepping up the building of a powerful country, foiling the ceaseless moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK under the uplifted banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The WPK has a lot of party members armed with the noble spirit the members of the DIU were possessed of and this guarantees the victory of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK founded and grown with the DIU as its roots is further demonstrating its invincible might under the wise leadership of the respected H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We extend invariable support and encouragement to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Syrian Media Praise Party-building Exploits of Great Men
articles.content:
Syrian Media Praise Party-building Exploits of Great Men
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Syrian media carried special write-ups on October 4 and 10 on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Syria TV Channel aired successes being achieved by the Korean people in the drive for building a socialist power, illustrated with photos of the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It praised the party-building exploits of the great leaders and said service personnel and people of the DPRK are creating epochal changes in all fields under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, shattering the moves of the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK.
					
					 The Syrian Central Radio reported special news praising the 70-odd-year long history of the WPK.
					
					 The SANA aired the news in detail that Kim Jong Un is leading the revolution and construction with a firm hold on the ideological work as a powerful weapon, accompanied by his photo.
					
					 The newspaper Al Thawrah said in an article that the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung has always won victory, meeting all challenges of the hostile forces under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The newspaper Al Baath in an article praised the leadership history of the WPK which has brought about eye-opening miracles and events in the annals of the arduous revolution by leading the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The newspaper Al Nour carried an article praising the party-building exploits of Kim Jong Un.
